data-objects: list all data objects touched by this use case

ARCHITECTURE.description: Did you architect the system to minimize and separate?

tactics.description: Collect physical address information in case useful later
Collect email only since no other information is needed
Collect as much information as possible in each country depending on what is allowed

SECURE.description: Did you secure the system by hiding and abstracting data?

SUPERVISE.description: Are you supervising through enforcing policies and demonstrating compliance with policies?

BALANCE.description: Are you balancing the interest of individuals and the business through informing them and giving them control where practical?
